dict.acceptation: 擦，拭；擦去，消除；涂上；刷卡；

sent.orig: You have 15 minutes to kill them or you automatically wipe.
sent.trans: 你需要在15分钟内解决战斗，否则你将自动wipe.不明白。

sent.orig: Gradually changes can be broken down into fade, dissolve, spin and wipe etc.
sent.trans: 渐变又可以细分成淡入淡出(fade)、融合(dissolve)、旋转(spin)、翻转(wipe)等等。

sent.orig: Wipe well. If canned straw mushroom is used, rinse, wipe and cut into halves.
sent.trans: 如用罐装的草菇，开罐后洗一洗，抹干水便可。

sent.orig: Cleaning by wipe fan wei water cloth, rubber and gasoline wipe.
sent.trans: 冲洗印版用擦布次给有火擦布、胶擦布和汽油擦布不一栽。

sent.orig: Wet Wipe, Mop, Wipe, Filter Media, Pu Substrate, Geotextiles Housekeeping Products.
sent.trans: 采购产品湿擦拭，澳门币，擦拭，过滤介质，普底，土工布持家产品。
